Workflow.Name: ReviewHub - Access Request Submitted
Workflow.Description: This flow triggers the approval process for the temporary stakeholder access request. Flow failure results in a notification not being sent out to users that their request has bee submitted successfully and the admins not being notified of a new request being made.

Description.description: This flow triggers the approval process for the temporary stakeholder access request. Flow failure results in a notification not being sent out to users that their request has bee submitted successfully and the admins not being notified of a new request being made.
